body:
Apollo's Scrim/Tourney Videos:
-----------------------------------------------------------
Tournaments:

TOC Semi Finals: Apollo vs Insidia (Full Video)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dULaCtXtNio&feature=youtu.be

TOC Final: Apollo vs Berzerk (Highlights)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGc9MDjksf4&index=5&list=PLciySlxK8Kvw27Dlr5yxVtOu7vpSt6bt9

-----------------------------------------------------------
Scrims:

The Game Changers - Scrim Highlights
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iEqi8GGZajI&list=PLciySlxK8Kvw27Dlr5yxVtOu7vpSt6bt9&index=4

The Game Changers vs Team Allah (Highlights)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5Z5lavnyo4&index=1&list=PLciySlxK8Kvw27Dlr5yxVtOu7vpSt6bt9

The Game Changers vs Team Allah (Full Video)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=En5exExwElw&list=PLciySlxK8Kvw27Dlr5yxVtOu7vpSt6bt9&index=2

The Game Changers vs Team Lightning (Full Video)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=85FT5ZGOJF4&index=3&list=PLciySlxK8Kvw27Dlr5yxVtOu7vpSt6bt9

Apollo vs Fortissimus (Highlights)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysUv1q3KEHE&list=PLciySlxK8Kvw27Dlr5yxVtOu7vpSt6bt9&index=6

Apollo vs Fortissimus & Bad Company (Full Video)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TEoYmgzORTI&feature=youtu.be



I will add more videos here when my team send me them, there are loads that I have lost the links for.
